item.description:
Hartford Jazz Orchestra

Come picnic with us...

Once again I will be late, probably 6:30 or so, look for Dal and Bryan with the BW scarf and balloons!!!

 

free

The Harford Jazz Orchestra has been entertaining people for over 45 years. Lead saxophonist Seb Giacco has been with the orchestra since its formation in 1965 and looks forward to performing in his hometown. A favorite with the audience this is the sixth time the orchestra has performed at the Mansion.

Once again the Friends of Long Hill present their annual summer concert series on the south lawn of the Wadsworth Mansion. We welcome guests to bring a picnic dinner and enjoy an evening with family, friends and great musicians. Grounds open at 5:30 p.m. and the concerts begin at 6:30 p.m. The event is free and you can find free parking at the Mansion, at the Wilbert Snow School: 299 Wadsworth Street, and at Mercy High School: 1740 Randolph Road. Concerts will be held in light rain, or the threat of showers. Concerts will be cancelled in electrical storms or threat to the wellbeing of the musicians or their instruments.

http://www.wadsworthmansion.com/
item.how_to_find_us: I will fly the Black and white scarf on a pole, Black & White Balloons
item.name: Hartford Jazz Orchestra - The Wadsworth Mansion at Long Hill
